metadata.title: CVE-2021-4435 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An untrusted search path vulnerability was found in Yarn. When a victimruns certain Yarn commands in a directory with attacker-controlled content,malicious commands could be executed in unexpected ways.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

yarnpkg - 1.22.19+~cs24.27.18-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-yarnpkg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.19+~cs24.27.18-4').
